Package org.hkijena.acaq5.ui.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACAQAlgorithmListCellRenderer
    Renders ACAQAlgorithm
    ACAQDataDeclarationListCellRenderer
    Renders ACAQDataDeclaration
    ACAQIconPickerDialog
    Dialog that picks an icon
    ACAQInheritanceConversionListCellRenderer
    Renders inheritance conversion entries
    ACAQParameterAccessUI
    UI around a ACAQParameterHolder
    ACAQTraitPicker
    Panel that allows to pick ACAQTraitDeclaration
    ACAQTraitPicker.MultiSelectionModel  
    ACAQTraitPicker.Renderer  
    ACAQTraitPicker.SelectedTraitsChangedEvent
    Generated when a trait is selected
    ACAQTraitPicker.SingleSelectionModel

    Generated when a trait is deselected
    ACAQTraitPicker.TraitSelectedEvent
    Generated when a trait is selected
    ACAQValidityReportUI
    UI for an ACAQValidityReport
    AddAlgorithmSlotPanel
    UI that adds slots to an algorithm
    ColorIcon
    Icon that is only one specific color, including border
    ConfirmingButton
    Button that shows a nice confirmation of some action taken
    DocumentChangeListener
    Listener for any changes in a Document
    DocumentedComponent
    Wrapper around a component that adds a split pane that shows documentation
    DocumentTabListCellRenderer
    Renders DocumentTabPane tabs
    DocumentTabPane
    JTabbedPane with larger tabs, ability to close tabs, singleton tabs that are hidden instead of being closed
    DocumentTabPane.DocumentTab
    Encapsulates a tab
    FileSelection
    Text field with a file selection
    FormPanel
    Organizes UI in a form layout with integrated help functionality, and grouping with conditional visibility
    FormPanel.GroupHeaderPanel
    Panel that contains a group header
    InheritanceConversionEditorUI
    Editor for an inheritance conversion stored in an ACAQSlotDefinition
    InheritedSlotListCellRenderer
    Renders an available entry for inherited slot in ACAQSlotDefinition
    MarkdownDocument
    Contains Markdown data
    MarkdownReader
    Panel that allows reading of Markdown data
    MonochromeColorIcon
    Icon that takes an existing image icon and uses it as mask for recoloring
    PickAlgorithmDialog
    UI that adds slots to an algorithm
    PlotExporterDialog
    Dialog that exports plots as image
    PlotReader
    Displays a plot
    PrefixedIconListCellRenderer
    Renders entries in ACAQIconPickerDialog
    RecentJsonExtensionsMenu
    Menu that displays recently opened ACAQJsonExtension
    RecentProjectsMenu
    Menu that displays recently opened ACAQProject
    ReloadableValidityChecker
    Panel that encapsulates a ACAQValidityReportUI and an ACAQValidatable.
